item.title: Afifah add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Mencintai adalah melebur dengan orang yang kita cintai dan menemukan percikan Tuhan di dalam dirinya." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Afifah add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "jika anda memiliki kesempatan mendapatkan cinta pertama di sebuah toko kelontong, meskipun toko itu bobrok dan bau tengik, maka rebutlah cepat-cepat kesempatan itu, karena cinta semacam itu bisa menjadi demikian indah tak terperikan! " -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description:
"Jika berfikir positif, ternyata mengenal seseorang secara emosional memberikan akses pada sebuah bank data kepribadian tempat kita belajar banyak hal baru.
" -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Hidup adalah mempersembahkan yang terbaik bagi Allah dan tanah tumpah darah." -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Ketika kau masih bertemu pagi dan putuskan diri untuk berdiri menghadapi berjuang dengan hati di jalan Illahi maka saat itu kau telah mengakhiri hari dengan satu lagi kemenangan sejati " -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Afifah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein
